CITY: Sverige

Solution Architect Electric Power Distribution

(Medium Voltage and Low Voltage)

Schneider Electric™ creates connected technologies that reshape industries, transform cities and enrich lives. Our 160,000 employees thrive in more than 100 countries. From the simplest of switches to complex operational systems, our technology, software and services improve the way our customers manage and automate their operations. Help us deliver solutions that ensure FIRSTNAME LASTNAME On everywhere, for everyone and at every moment: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VbldHPFltQQ

What we are looking for

We are looking for a Solution Architect for our Power System division, maybe you have been working a few years and want to grow with us. You will convert customers’ needs identified at early stage of the sales process into the most cost effective and less risky technical architecture & solutions leveraging proven & existing architectures; Prescribe Schneider medium voltage and low voltage (MV/LV) architecture to Healthcare and Cloud & Service providers segments. You will develop our related channel partners and work on design to End-users with support from our Innovation & competencies HUB team, Electra.

What do we offer you?

This is a great opportunity to join Schneider Electric and power your career! You will be joining an international, dynamic, and responsible company, with an enviable reputation in the market. Schneider fosters the development of all its’ people around the world. Every day, we empower employees to achieve more and experience exciting careers. Find out how our values and unique position make Schneider Electric the employer of choice – apply now.

You will be responsible to

• Promote the unique Market Value Propositions to influence customers/consultants with electrical power distribution complete architectures by bringing up differentiating and innovative technical proposals, addressing business requirements, customer process constraints and technical challenges.

• Lead all offer and reference architectures qualifications activities toward End-Users, Consultants, Specifiers, System Integrators with the support of our marketing division and technical teams. Take part of new Systems & Architectures launch for Healthcare and Cloud & Service Provider Segments.

• Establish close relationship with Customers' technical team in order to prescribe best fitting solutions vs. requirements and influence its requests for quotation. Convert customer needs in technical proposals & architectures focusing on reusing proven solutions and high value creation solutions.

• Perform technical influencing and specifying activities at early stages of business development & opportunity identification. Organize customer events, external technical events, technical demos and customer visits (in Schneider Electric's facilities and/or other customers' ones)

• Support Account Managers (V1) in opportunities analysis and qualifications vs. SE offer (S0 gate review). Identify potential new business opportunities. Provide and master all necessary technical specifications. Can take part of SOC (Solution Opportunity Committee).

Required skills and experiences

• Proven skills electric power distribution architectures

• Digital mindset (IoT and Analytics); BIM, CAD and knowledge of design, planning and calculation tool is a plus.

• Healthcare or Datacenter market knowledge or background is a plus

• Swedish spoken and written is a must, English fluent

• No experience required, proven skills is a must

When you work for Schneider Electric you work for a company focused on its people. We are proud to promote diversity, inclusion, people development and work-life integration!

Did we get you inspired?

Read more about us and apply at https://www.se.com/se/jobb

Contact persons

If you have questions regarding this position, please call Franck Pagnoux, at  TELEPHONENO and if you want to tell us more about yourself and why you think this is the right role for you, then feel free to call FIRSTNAME LASTNAME at  TELEPHONENO .

Welcome to submit your application!

At Schneider Electric, we call this FIRSTNAME LASTNAME On. https://www.se.com/se/jobb
